entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: SW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
